summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SkillProof Standard Version upgrade. All new features working: multiple skill categories (10 categories), search/filter functionality, leaderboard page, avatar upload, and enhanced UI. Backend APIs 100% functional (15/15 tests passed), frontend flows 100% successful with all navigation, forms, and interactions working correctly.
passed_tests: User registration with skill category selection (10 categories available)
User login/logout functionality with JWT authentication
Multiple skill categories support in registration and upload forms
Search functionality by keyword (title, description, username)
Filter posts by skill category with dropdown selection
Combined search and filter functionality
Leaderboard page showing top users by validations received
Avatar upload functionality on profile page
Profile page with bento grid stats (posts count and validations)
Upload form with skill category selection and video upload
Navigation between all pages (feed, upload, leaderboard, profile)
Navbar with leaderboard button, profile with avatar, logout
Skill category badges display on posts and profiles
Video playback with HTML5 controls
Validation system with animation effects
Hover effects on buttons and cards
Clean minimal professional styling with emerald green primary color
All backend API endpoints (15/15 tests passed including new endpoints)
Search API endpoints (/api/posts/search with query and category filters)
Leaderboard API endpoint (/api/leaderboard)
Skill categories API endpoint (/api/skill-categories)
Avatar upload API endpoint (/api/users/avatar)
Responsive UI components with proper data-testid attributes
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (15/15 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all flows successful)
